1
OENO: Are you ready, Cycad? Nighttime falls on Timber Hearth; we shall be beginning our task soon!
2
1
CYCAD: Wait, Oeno, how will we escape this chamber once we voyage into the <color=orange>Sanctuary?</color> There are no entrances or exits out of this space!
3 2
OENO: Using the quantum shard, of course! Simply leave your voyager standing on the quantum shard before disconnecting the voyager stone; as it is unable to observe its surroundings, the voyager becomes little more than a scroll entangled with the shard.
4
3
OENO: When you reengage the voyager stone, your voyager will have been entangled with the shard, and should be delivered outside to the surface of Timber Hearth!
5
3
CYCAD: But our mission here is to transport the native lifeforms into the Sanctuary to protect them during the operation of the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project,</color> isn't it? Won't the native lifeforms' sight cause the quantum shard to be locked in place?
6
5
OENO: That is why we are bringing them in during their hours of slumber! We must simply move quietly and stealthily to transport them into the <color=orange>Sanctuary</color> one by one while they sleep.
7
6
COLEUS: Afterwards, we will watch over them within the <color=orange>Sanctuary,</color> so they do not slip back outside through the quantum shard.
8
7
CYCAD: I see.. I shall do my best, Oeno! This task will surely help to distract my mind from the anticipation of the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project's</color> success..
